backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing lead forms, exposing queries for contact details and lead retrieval plus a submission method.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries referencing frontend files for logo, favicon, and UI changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions with light/dark mode CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app without a favicon reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all King Kingdom sections, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/con: Displays a list of clickable phone numbers with optional icon and separator.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/cta: Empty placeholder file for a call‑to‑action button component.
Empty placeholder file for a WhatsApp CTA button component.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Fea: Wrapper component rendering a Lucide icon in a styled gradient container.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Flo: Fixed-position WhatsApp CTA button linking to the configured WhatsApp contact URL.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Foo: Footer showing brand text, description, social links, quick links, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Gal: Dialog-based lightbox displaying an enlarged image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Hea: Sticky responsive header with text-only branding, smooth-scroll navigation, CTAs, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/sec: Shows an About section describing the company's identity, services, mission, and values.
Displays a gallery of construction photos with a lightbox for full‑size viewing.
Provides a contact form with validation plus address, phone, WhatsApp, and email details.
Hero section with intro text, service highlights, and buttons that scroll to contact or portfolio sections.
Shows four feature highlight cards with icons describing key service strengths.
Empty placeholder file for a materials-related section component.
Renders a portfolio grid displaying project images, titles, and locations.
Shows a six‑step explanation of the company’s construction workflow.
Empty placeholder file for a projects section component.
Displays a services grid using predefined service items with icons, titles, and descriptions.
Renders a list of reasons to choose the company, each with an icon, title, and description in a styled grid.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Top: Renders a top navigation bar showing phone numbers, WhatsApp, email, hours, and address using CONTACT_INFO.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines central contact information including phone numbers, WhatsApp, email, address, and business hours.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Provides social media link configuration and a helper to return only active links with valid URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for the King Kingdom design system.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds and opens WhatsApp message URLs using configured contact data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing feature states, and pending requests related to removing CCS branding.
